modName: YSOLDA and BRELYNA MARYON by Mike - NPC Editor - ApachiiSkyHair - UNP
summary:
As you can read in the title this mod simply replaces 2 NPCs in game: Ysolda and Brelyna Maryon.
I created it for myself and finally i decided to share them with the community.

There are 2 separate downloads so you can choose to use one of them or both of them.
descriptionHtml:
-- If You want to [b][color=#ff0000]DONATE[/color][/b] your 2 cents use  [b][color=#00ffff]bitcoin address  1E9AcG12To7BHrwcYpbEFdE3fHKWCQCJqR[/color][/b]  Tnx! ---

=====================================
= [color=#ffff00]YSOLDA and BRELYNA MARYON by Mike[/color] =
=====================================



As you can read in the title this mod simply replaces 2 NPC in game: Ysolda and Brelyna Maryon.
I created this mod for myself and finally i decided to share it with the community.

There are 2 separate downloads so you can choose to use one of them or both of them.

NOTE: You DONT need UNP for Brelyna so you can use Brelyna with cbbe too. You need UNP ONLY for Ysolda.



============= [color=#ff0000]UPDATES[/color] =============

- v1.1 added a missing texture to BRELYNA MARYON files, you should not see anymore her with discolored face. Sorry about this.




============= [color=#ff0000]YSOLDA[/color] ==============

In my game she is my spouse so i wanted her to be sexy but not skimpy.
Screenshots explains better than words anyway here a fast description:

-Now she uses hairstyle 03 from ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii.
-She has almost the original face traits, i just changed her mouth and tweaked a bit her nose.
-Now she wears a new custom dress that i created for her.
-Now she wears sandals.
-Now she uses a glass dagger as weapon, i removed the original iron dagger from her inventory.
(I'd suggest to use this simple mod 'Custom Dagger Position' by Kalpa2004 to reduce the clipping of daggers).
-I included the full UNP body inside her dress so if you peek under her skirt or into her neckline you will see all what you expect to see ... :D

--- What you need ---

- You NEED 'ApachiiSkyHair' by Apachii (ApachiiSkyHair v1.5 Full)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

- You NEED 'DIMONIZED UNP female body' by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
or any other mod that uses UNP textures and meshes.




============ [color=#ff0000]BRELYNA MARYON[/color] =============

-Now she uses hairstyle 28 from ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii.
-I used a new custom model for her face from the popular mod 'Ethereal Elven Overhaul' by nuska, so now she looks like you see in screenshots.

--- What you need ---

- You NEED ONLY 'ApachiiSkyHair' by Apachii (ApachiiSkyHair v1.5 Full)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
